name: CPInterfaceControllerDelegate
desc: The interface that an object implements to serve as a delegate to an interface controller.

items.name: func templateWillAppear(CPTemplate, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the template will appear onscreen.

items.name: func templateDidAppear(CPTemplate, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the template did appear onscreen.

items.name: func templateWillDisappear(CPTemplate, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the template will disappear from the screen.

items.name: func templateDidDisappear(CPTemplate, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the template did disappear from the screen.
